title: #109: The Science of Health & the Discovery of C60 | Ken Swartz
description:
Who would have thought that the discovery of a theorized particle from Red Giant stars would have such massive benefit to us, little humans, here on Earth, but when C60 was discovered it did just that.

Ken Swartz, the Founder and Chief Science Officer of C60 Purple Power, stops by to explain the discovery of the molecule of carbon with 60 atoms and why the scientists that discovered it were rewarded with the Nobel Prize for their troubles.

The antioxidant properties of this substance are off the charts and literally hundreds of times more powerful than anything else on the market, but Ken is able to explain why this is the case, how the process actually works, and why we should be incorporating this into our daily lives.
